full_title: KAKSS Cast Iron Kettlebell 6kg, Black and White Kettle Bell with Smooth Seamless Handle and Wide Flat Machined Base for Home Gym Equipment and Fitness Training

reasoning.keyword_integration_strategy: Prioritized the highest-volume keywords ('kettlebell', 'kettle bell', '6kg kettlebell', 'cast iron kettlebell', 'home gym equipment', 'fitness') by weaving them into a natural description. Incorporated verified product features (cast iron, smooth handle, flat base) and corrected the color to 'Black and White' as per the image analysis.
